original_text: And the priest shall sprinkle the blood upon the altar of the Lord at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and burn the fat for a sweet savour unto the Lord.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 피를 회막 문 여호와의 제단에 뿌리고 그 기름을 불살라 여호와께 향기로운 냄새가 되게 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall sprinkle the blood
upon the altar of the Lord
at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
for a sweet savour unto the Lord
